org.gbif.dwc.validator.result.impl

Class ThresholdResultAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.dwc.validator.result.impl.ThresholdResultAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResultAccumulatorIF

    public class ThresholdResultAccumulator
extends Object
implements ResultAccumulatorIF
    ResultAccumulatorIF implementation that use a threshold to determine when to flush to a file.
    Author:
    cgendreau
